data.quote: When everything seems like an uphill struggle, just thing about the view from the top.
data.author: Ella Wright

data.quote: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
data.author: Napoleon Hill

data.quote: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
data.author: E. E. Cummings

data.quote: The only person you should strive to be better than, is the person you were yesterday.
data.author: Matty Mullins

data.quote: Don't wait for opportunity. Create it!
data.author: Don Shula

data.quote: Push yourself, because no one is going to do it for you.
data.author: Jim Rohn
